Average cluster to cluster signaling.

Source: R/Signaling.R
ClusterSig.Rd

Average cluster to cluster signaling.

ClusterSig(Pcell, cluster_labels, normalize_rows = FALSE)

Arguments

Pcell

signaling probabilities cells x cells
cluster_labels

labels of cells 1:n
normalize_rows

normalize the rows of the output matrix so that the rows sum to 1, default true

Value

a matrix of cluster to cluster signaling

Contents
